**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line: 
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:
Watches done with the `Timeout` field of `ListOptions` set to some value T end after T regardless of whether there has been any activity in the meantime.

**What you expected to happen**:
I expected the watch to end when no events have been delivered in the last T.  In ordinary usage, a "timeout" is something that happens _if_ there has been no activity for the specified length of time.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
Create a configmap named `b` in namespace `foo`.  Then in one shell thrash it periodically like this:

```
$ while true; do kubectl patch configmap b -n foo -p '{"data": {"b": "x"}}'; sleep 7; kubectl patch configmap b -n foo -p '{"data": {"b": "y"}}'; sleep 7; done
```
Observe that it proceeds to update the configmap every 7 seconds or so.

In another shell do a watch with a timeout; observe that it ends even though the thrashing continues.
```
$ date; curl 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/namespaces/foo/configmaps?watch=true&timeoutSeconds=42'; date
Sat Jan 20 01:44:31 UTC 2018
{"type":"ADDED","object":{"kind":"ConfigMap","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"b","namespace":"foo","selfLink":"/api/v1/namespaces/foo/configmaps/b","uid":"2769c179-fd64-11e7-8d7f-525400178201","resourceVersion":"2205310","creationTimestamp":"2018-01-19T22:00:25Z"},"data":{"b":"y"}}}
{"type":"MODIFIED","object":{"kind":"ConfigMap","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"b","namespace":"foo","selfLink":"/api/v1/namespaces/foo/configmaps/b","uid":"2769c179-fd64-11e7-8d7f-525400178201","resourceVersion":"2205577","creationTimestamp":"2018-01-19T22:00:25Z"},"data":{"b":"x"}}}
{"type":"MODIFIED","object":{"kind":"ConfigMap","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"b","namespace":"foo","selfLink":"/api/v1/namespaces/foo/configmaps/b","uid":"2769c179-fd64-11e7-8d7f-525400178201","resourceVersion":"2205591","creationTimestamp":"2018-01-19T22:00:25Z"},"data":{"b":"y"}}}
{"type":"MODIFIED","object":{"kind":"ConfigMap","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"b","namespace":"foo","selfLink":"/api/v1/namespaces/foo/configmaps/b","uid":"2769c179-fd64-11e7-8d7f-525400178201","resourceVersion":"2205605","creationTimestamp":"2018-01-19T22:00:25Z"},"data":{"b":"x"}}}

```
